sourceMeaningMnemonic: Under this <radical>roof</radical> is a <radical>pig</radical>. Your pig, because it's your <kanji>house</kanji>! You keep your pig inside where it's nice and warm. He's a member of your family, so he deserves to live in your <kanji>home</kanji> too.
meaningInfo: Picture the little pig, prancing around happily under the roof of your house.
readingMnemonic: Also in your <kanji>house</kanji>, is your <reading>ca</reading>r (<ja>か</ja>). Your pig and your car are safe under your roof.
readingInfo: Picture the pig again, but this time sitting in your car, which is also in your house. The three of you are warm and cozy and safe together in your home.
